survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Chef Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and gather feedback on AI-powered personal chef services, including ease of use, customization, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered personal chef services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of usage. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered personal chef services?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal chef service do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to identify key features. Consider randomizing options to reduce order bias.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal chef service do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the meal recommendations provided by the AI-powered personal chef service?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'This is my first time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Include a 'Not applicable' option if necessary.
